duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee daily warehouse activities including shipping, receiving, and inventory maintenance.
Manage a team of 20+ employees, including hiring, training, and performance appraisal.
Ensure inventory accuracy through cycle counts and reconciliation activities.
Develop and maintain departmental work instructions and adjust work procedures as per production schedules.
Implement policies to enforce a safe and clean warehouse environment.
Recommend measures to improve service quality, efficiency, and equipment performance.
Drive continuous improvement through the use of lean practices.
Monitor and operate within the department budget and oversee chemical supply and storage.
Collaborate with other departments to drive improvements and synergies.

education_certification.credential: Associates degree and 2-4 years of relevant warehouse experience (including 1+ year of previous supervisory experience), or equivalent combination of education and experience. Experience with MRP system, preferably with Oracle. Working knowledge of MS Office such as Excel, Word and Outlook.
